1) The notes in an F augmented seventh chord are: F, A, C#, E 
2) On a standard ukulele tuned G-C-E-A, this chord would be:
G string: fret 1  (F)

4) To play an F note on the B string, we need to fret the 3rd fret.
5) The C, E and A notes can still be played open or at the 2nd fret as before.

C string: fret 0
